name: Fire Farm VR
summary:
Uh-oh, looks like those three little egg cookin’ piggies are up to no good! What seemed like a normal breakfast in the barn, suddenly took a turn for the worse. Now, as the big red barn is engulfed in flames, the farm animals need your help as they scram to safety! Load up your slingshot with fresh-filled water balloons and step into FireFarm VR!

FireFarm VR is an action packed, single-player, Indie developed shooter where the player is equipped with a water balloon slingshot and has one goal: save the farm animals. Players will rescue wave after wave of animals with increasing difficulty, in an attempt to restore peace on the farm.
